Dialogue.Page: Welcome, traveler.
You find yourself in the halls of the Sacred Shrubbery. Be welcomed in the Shrubbery's warm embrace.
That is was we used to say, at least. Before the Shrubbery and all Its holiness were lost to the wild.
What a horrible thing to befall these people...

DialogueOption.Text: What's the Sacred Shrubbery?
What's so important about this shrubbery?
How did you lose it?

Dialogue.Page: The Sacred Shrubbery is our almighty angelic guide. It is the creator of everything on this planet. We owe our existence to It.
And It has been lost. We may never find It again.
We had taken It up to the surface to replenish Its divine energy by basking in the sun's radiance.
But a heavy wind struck, abducting our giver of holiness, never to be seen again.

DialogueOption.Text: Why don't you just go look for it?
Did you see where it went?
Well, I have good news!

Dialogue.Page: There is nothing that could possibly remedy the disappearance of our savior. Bring your news to someone else.

DialogueOption.Text: Look what I found!
I guess you won't be needing this Sacred Shrubbery, then.

Dialogue.Page: What did you-
Is it truly..? Is it our golden savior?
It must be! Thank you, traveler! We are indebted to you.
Wait! What did you say? Did you find It?
By the Shrub, you have! Thank you, traveler. There must be some way we can repay you.
What would you ask of us?

DialogueOption.Text: Your firstborn child.
Can you help us open the Great Door?

Dialogue.Page: I am sorry, but I have no children. Is there something else we could give you?

DialogueOption.Text: Can you help us open the Great Door?

Dialogue.Page: The Great Door? Certainly!
Place the Sacred Shrubbery upon Its divine pedestal at the back of these halls, and we will come to the Great Door.
Our Shrubbery granted us the protection and safety we need to traverse the surface of this planet.
Without It, we are vurnerable; nothing stops the other clans from using their unholy technology against us.
We cannot search for It without Its sacred protection.

DialogueOption.Text: Did you see where it went?

Dialogue.Page: One of the Followers witnessed It land on one of the islands next to this one, but we did not have time to retrieve It before we began to feel the prescene of unholy forces.

This is not just any shrubbery. This is The Sacred Shrubbery, Guardian of Light, Protector of the Faithful, Beacon of Hope, Harbinger of Peace, Fountain of Wisdom, Arbiter of Justice, Patron of Tranquility, Sentinel of the Sacred Grove, Keeper of Secrets, Bearer of Blessings, Herald of Harmony, Warden of the Wilds, Custodian of Serenity, Embodiment of Divinity, Celestial Arboreal Entity, Sovereign of Sanctity, Patron of Purity, Custodian of the Cosmos, Arboreal Avatar of the Divine, Eternal Witness of Time, Beacon of Eternity, Luminary of the Heavens, Arboreal Monument of Grace, Guardian of the Ethereal Realm, Conduit of Cosmic Energy, Essence of Enlightenment, Vessel of the Divine Will, Divine Arboreal Manifestation, Incarnation of Sacred Nature, Holistic Guardian of Existence, Arboreal Avatar of the Divine Will.

DialogueOption.Text: That's... quite a name.
It really is a Sacred Shrubbery!

Dialogue.Page: For a Shrubbery as divine as this, a name of such extravagance only captures a mere fraction of its divinity.
That is, if we even had a Shrubbery as divine as that.
The path to a higher existence begins with the worship of the Sacred Shrubbery.
I would invite you to worship It, but It is no longer.
Please, traveler. Aid us in the recovery of the Sacred Shrubbery. We will not survive without It.

DialogueOption.Text: I'll have it done in no time.
What's in it for me?
Where did you say it went?

Dialogue.Page: Thank you, traveler. There must be some way we can repay you?

DialogueOption.Text: Can you help us open the Great Door?

Dialogue.Page: Anything for the savior of our Sacred Shrubbery.

DialogueOption.Text: Can you help us open the Great Door?

Dialogue.Page: The Great Door? That is a difficult favor. But, with the power of our Sacred Shrubbery restored, it will be easily accomplished.
When you have returned It, we will join you at the Great Door.
Are you having problems with retreiving the Sacred Shrubbery?

DialogueOption.Text: Where did you say it went?
Where do I put the Sacred Shrubbery when I find it?

Dialogue.Page: One of the Followers witnessed It land on one of the islands next to this one, but we did not have time to retrieve It before we began to feel the prescene of unholy forces.
I hope you are able to locate It. Shrubspeed, traveler.
Place the Sacred Shrubbery atop Its divine throne at the very back of these halls.
Take care not to get lost on the way there.
Could it be..? Is it truly our long lost savior?
Thank the Shrub! I knew you would find It!
Please escort It to the back of these halls. The holy shrine awaits It.
Oh, how I have missed our holy savior! Far too long has it been since we have seen It.
I can already feel Its divine protection encompassing me. Thank you, traveler. We bid you farewell.

DialogueOption.Text: Aren't you going to help us open the Great Door?

Dialogue.Page: Oh, yes. Of course. When everyone is prepared to open the Door, we will come and place our shard in.
Is there anything else?

DialogueOption.Text: Do you know anything about the Fifth Shard?
I'll see you at the Door.

Dialogue.Page: I was reading a scroll earlier that I believe mentioned the Fifth Shard you speak of.
If I recall correctly, it said something along the lines of "Move it to the shortest pillar..."
I hope that helps you.
I was reading a scroll earlier that I believe mentioned the Fifth Shard you speak of.
If I recall correctly, it said something along the lines of "Move it to the shortest pillar..."
I hope that helps you.
What do you want now?

DialogueOption.Text: Aren't you going to come to the Great Door?
Do you know anything about the Fifth Shard?
Nothing, sorry.

Dialogue.Page: Yes, certainly. We only need to... finish our prayers to the Sacred Shrubbery. Then we will meet you at the Great Door.

DialogueOption.Text: If you say so...

Dialogue.Page: Hello, again.

DialogueOption.Text: Why aren't you praying to the Sacred Shrubbery?
Do you know anything about the Fifth Shard?
What do you think is behind the Great Door?
Bye.

Dialogue.Page: It was abducted from our halls once more. I almost cannot believe it myself.
How we could allow such a sacred being to slip through our fingers a second time is... painful. Perhaps we are not worthy of being Followers of Worship.
From the moment our ancestors found the Great Door, we felt it calling out to us, to open it.
The Sacred Shrubbery is only a vessel for a greater power. Its true form lies within that prison.
Our task, as the Followers of Worship, is to free It from that cold, oppressive vault, bringing us into a new age of peace.
And we, The Followers of Worship, will be at the forefront, leading the clans to salvation under the holy guidance of the Golden Tree.
